oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition baptism home movie, 1974
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video footage begins with a baptism in cold weather performed by Johnny Holbrook. Followed by a service where member handle serpent and fire. Another baptism is held where many children and several adults are baptized. Followed by a service and another baptism in a different location.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Baptisms; Dance -- Religious aspects; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Baptism, Funeral, and Wedding home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
